forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 42. South southeast wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens to a calm and crisp atmosphere. The sky, partly cloaked by delicate clouds, hints at a brightening day ahead. As the sun prepares to rise, a gentle south-southeast breeze whispers through the streets, barely meriting a note in the chill of the dawn. Expecting sunshine after the night’s tranquility, temperatures will peak just shy of 56 degrees, offering a mild contrast to the biting coolness of the early hours. The afternoon will see a gradual descent to the low fifties, caressed by a soft west-southwest wind that promises to carry away any lingering clouds. 

This morning’s clarity seems promising, yet there lingers a subtle reminder of San Francisco’s signature marine layer, perhaps darting discreetly along the edges of the bay, veiling the underbelly of the Golden Gate. For those stepping out, a warm sweater or light jacket would suffice, a nod to the city’s unpredictable moods. A stroll along the Embarcadero could be invigorating, perhaps paired with a warm drink from a nearby café, as the sun bathes the bay in gentle light. As the day unfurls, wandering through the city’s winding streets or indulging in quiet moments at Dolores Park might become delightful interludes, inviting reflection as the ambiance transforms with the changing light.
